message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I believe it's a fantastic deal, what do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit too high for my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $200 represents the value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $170. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $170 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet in the middle.
